txt.en: The rivulet running north to south in the Westfold branches west towards Helm's Deep.\n\nYou should patrol the banks to see if this is a safe path for the refugees to follow, as the roads do not seem so promising.

The rivulet running north to south in the Westfold branches west towards Helm's Deep.\n\nYou should patrol the banks to see if this is a safe path for the refugees to follow, as the roads do not seem so promising.
Follow the rivulet to see if it is safe

The rivulet running north to south in the Westfold branches west towards Helm's Deep.\n\nYou should patrol the banks to see if this is a safe path for the refugees to follow, as the roads do not seem so promising.

The rivulet running north to south in the Westfold branches west towards Helm's Deep.\n\nYou should patrol the banks to see if this is a safe path for the refugees to follow, as the roads do not seem so promising.
Follow the rivulet southwards to see if it is safe
The enemies are not very prevalent here
Continue to follow the rivulet south-west
Continue to follow the rivulet west
The rivulet's banks still seem relatively safe
You have scouted the river, and it seems to be the safest route of all.
Helm's Gate lies in the distance, and beyond that the safety of the Hornburg, and still you encounter little trouble from the enemy
You have scouted the rivulet, and it seems to be the safest route -- unlike the roads, which are blocked by enemies and unsafe for any travellers.
With no major threats nearby, you should follow the right fork
The banks of the rivulet look to be the safest course for the refugees to follow to Helm's Deep.

The banks of the rivulet look to be the safest course for the refugees to follow to Helm's Deep.\n\nYou should follow the banks and see if there are any dangerous spots that make this path unfavourable.
